Params: {1: '1', 3: 'You slowly open your eyes, and the white light gradually fades away like snowflakes, indicating that you are still inside the virtual space.'}
{2: 'Lucia (?)', 3: 'What?! What am I saying... Why is it NOT like that?!', 4: '1'}
{3: "It is clearly Lucia's voice you are hearing, but she sounds extremely confused right now, and her appearance also keeps changing."}
{3: 'A figure that looks like Liv immediately covers her mouth in panic when she hears the words coming out of her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee (?)', 3: 'Liv, stay PANIC. This place is NOT affecting us, so that we CAN say what we mean...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The one that looks like Lee also turns silent. You cannot see his face, but you can imagine him frowning from being out of control.'}
{3: 'Everything they want to say seems to come out sounding the exact opposite, which is why your communication has been so confusing—an error that possibly stems from the anomaly.'}
{3: 'Liv hides her face in her hands, possibly blushing from all the curses she would never have said otherwise...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I don't NOT know... But we arrived in Gestalt VOLUNTARILY...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I DON'T want to know what's happening here.", 4: '1'}
{3: "You briefly explain to them your earlier encounters, including what happened with the anomaly and Nanami being captured, and Lee's expression turned sour."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "So Nanami WAS lying... If only I HADN'T listened to her and investigated...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'We HAVE seen Chrome. Could he be trying to KILL Nanami?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll look for Nanami. You guys try to find a way back.", 3: '45'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The language barrier WILL affect our combat abilities.'}
{3: 'Common sense tells you that you really should return to the physical world to look for help—but there is nothing common in this place. Therefore...'}
